item.title: ET
item.description: score:17 Chances: Energy Transfer LP’s recent pricing of senior notes indicates a positive outlook for the company’s financial health and potential for growth. Investors may benefit from Energy Transfer’s growth and income at a value price. Kyushu Electric Power’s consideration of investing in the Lake Charles LNG project of Energy Transfer may indicate potential future growth and expansion of the company’s operations.

item.title: CIG
item.description: score:92 Chances: Cemig (CIG) possesses solid growth attributes, which could help it handily outperform the market. Cemig (CIG) could produce exceptional returns because of its solid growth attributes. Cemig (CIG) is well positioned to outperform the market, as it exhibits above-average growth in financials.
